_notes.docx:document: Full read/write access to cloud documents (create, read, edit, import)
_notes.drive:drive: Full access to cloud drive files (needed for images and file operations)
_notes.drive:drive:readonly: Read-only access to cloud drive files
_notes.wiki:wiki: Full access to wiki/knowledge base spaces and nodes
_notes.im:message:send_as_bot: Send sync status notifications as bot (tenant only)
_notes.search:docs_content: Search across documents by keyword (tenant only)
_notes.sheets:spreadsheet:readonly: Read spreadsheet content if referenced in docs
_notes.bitable:app:readonly: Read multidimensional table content if referenced in docs
_notes.contact:contact.base:readonly: Resolve @mentions and user references in documents
_notes.offline_access: Enables refresh tokens for background sync without re-auth
